sentences.english: But for you, every day I will dream the most beautiful apart.
sentences.chinese: 可是由于有了你，我，天天均可以梦想最绚丽的拜别。

sentences.english: Colorful ribbons are embellishing this world of variety.
sentences.chinese: 绚丽的彩带，点缀世界万象色彩。

sentences.english: Don't give me a colorful dream, then personally into smithereens.
sentences.chinese: 不要给我一个绚丽多姿的梦，再亲手打的粉碎。

sentences.english: Dark ruby cherry colour with light brick edges.
sentences.chinese: 绚丽的深樱桃色带红边，色泽清晰。

sentences.english: Beautiful feeling, for whom the load.
But the friendship has been brilliant at times after losing ground.
sentences.chinese: 但友情却一直绚丽在时光节节败退后。

sentences.english: I believe I am your world becomes colorful.
sentences.chinese: 相信我你的世界变得绚丽多姿。

sentences.english: The rosy light yet beamed like a celestial dawn.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰色的红光依然象天上的朝霞一样绚丽。

sentences.english: To be with you, in every flowery mornings .
sentences.chinese: 和你在一起，每一个绚丽清晨。

sentences.english: Many places have dazzling displays that light up the night.
sentences.chinese: 很多地方都有能够点亮这个夜晚的绚丽多彩的表演。

sentences.english: The bright national dress, the school was dressed more blew.

sentences.english: Gold-inlaid lacquer ware is elegant and magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 金漆镶嵌制品，绚丽典雅。

sentences.english: Clotted cream in all its yellow gorgeousness would be very good here, too.
sentences.chinese: 在那绚丽金黄色中填满冻奶油也是非常不错的。

sentences.english: The mercy of God like unfaded cloth, although that was rinsed by adversities but still remain its bright colour.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的爱像不褪色的布料，被逆境冲洗，仍色彩绚丽。

sentences.english: Other kinds of folk dances are the sword dance and the colourful peacock dance.
sentences.chinese: 其他的民族舞蹈是剑舞和云南傣族色彩绚丽的孔雀舞。

sentences.english: And I should pray for the glory of a colorful sunset.
sentences.chinese: 而我也将为能够看到绚丽多彩的落日余辉而祈祷。

definition: lit. flowing light and overflowing color/brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
